object_description: a rectangular puzzle cube with orange, green, and yellow colored faces

milestones.label: approach
milestones.description: The hand begins moving toward the cuboid puzzle.

milestones.label: grasp
milestones.description: The hand makes contact and grips the cuboid puzzle.

milestones.label: lift
milestones.description: The hand slides the puzzle laterally across the wooden table.

milestones.label: release
milestones.description: The hand releases the puzzle at the new position.

milestones.label: retract
milestones.description: The hand moves away from the puzzle.
